name: Affordable Rental Housing
title: Affordable Rental Housing
summary: Shall the measure to authorize the City of Oakland to develop, construct, or acquire, or assist the development of, up to 13,000 low rent residential units in social housing projects within the City for the purpose of providing affordable rental housing be adopted?

opposing_organizations.name: California Association of Realtors Issues Mobilization PAC
opposing_organizations.payee: California Association of Realtors Issues Mobilization PAC
